series_description: This series documents the use, performance, maintenance, repair, or servicing of residency buildings or grounds, including budget information. This series may include, but is not limited to: work orders, warranties, and vouchers.
retention_statement: 3 Years after creation

series_description: This series documents problems in the toll lane, maintenance and repairs, unusual occurrences, and toll revenue overages and shortages for each lane. This series may include, but is limited to: logs.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Daily Shift Log This series document daily activities such as lane openings or closings, air conditioning repair, gate or vault maintenance as reported by the on duty supervisor of the toll booths. This may include, but is no limited to: logs
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the previous day's revenue collected from Fast Tolls (Automated Vehicle Identification) and the fees that the Fast Toll Service Center charged for its services. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the use of hired/rented equipment and crews by VDOT. This series may include, but is not limited to: payments, justifications, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents amounts of hourly traffic by listing the classification of the vehicles (number of axles), AVI transactions, revenue totals, and daily violations at each lane. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the issuance of a new identification or replacement card to toll collectors. This series includes, but not limited to: identification cards.
retention_statement: 1 Year after expiration

series_description: This series documents the daily assignment of toll collectors to specific lanes, any unusual occurrences and the time they occurred. This series may include, but is not limited to: logs.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the daily assignment of toll collectors to specific lanes, including money bags and any unusual occurrences and the time they occurred. This series may include, but is not limited to: toll collector, money bag, and deposit information.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the pickup and return of toll lane money bags by armored car contractor representatives. This series may include, but is not limited to: inventory reports.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the number of passes of authorized personnel exempt from paying tolls.
retention_statement: 3 Months after creation

series_description: This series documents the summary of the total number of passes of authorized personnel through all the tolls without requiring toll payments. This series may include, but is not limited to: toll reports and passes of authorized personnel exempt from paying tolls.
retention_statement: 3 Years after creation

series_description: This series documents resolution of patron complaints transactions or incidents at the toll booths. This series may include, but is not limited to: complaints and resolutions.
retention_statement: 2 Years after closed

series_description: This series documents which vault is in use and which vault is closed, out for repair, or in storage. This series may include, is not limited to: inventories.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the recording of all activities in and around toll bridge offices and toll lanes to provide security coverage and verification. This series may include but is not limited to: video recordings.
retention_statement: 120 Days after creation

series_description: This series documents toll booth monthly revenue and vehicle transactions, including monthly breakdown of the location, classification of vehicles, number of transactions, and revenue collected . This series may include, but is not limited to: reports
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents and tracks transactions and revenue collections. This series may include, but is not limited to: vehicles, number of transactions, axle counts, totals, and summaries.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents toll collector's work schedules and their shifts. This series may include, but is not limited to: names and shifts.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents citizens complaints of damage to personal property by the road system. This series may include, but is not limited to: complaints, forms, and resolutions
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents any incident that affects the amount of money collected at the lane or vault and the daily deposit. This series may include, but is not limited to: incident reports.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the pickup and return of toll lane vaults by armored car contractor representatives . This series may include, but is not limited to: vault locations.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year
